product_name: The North Face Apex Pneumatic Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring lightweight weather-resistance and breathability, the Apex Pneumatic jacket from The North Face lets you embark on moderate-weather adventures in total comfort. Apex Universal soft-shell fabric remains breathable and features 4-way stretch for full range of motion; Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Interior windflap prevents wind from sneaking through; brushed collar lining provides next-to-skin softness. The North Face Apex Pneumatic jacket has a hem cinch-cord adjustment in pockets and elastic-bound cuffs. Zippered hand pockets and Napoleon chest pocket; drop-in interior mesh pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring lightweight weather-resistance and breathability, the Apex Pneumatic jacket from The North Face lets you embark on moderate-weather adventures in total comfort.
